title: Blitzscaling
author: Reid Hoffman and Chris Yeh
description: Explores rapid scaling strategies for startups in uncertain markets to achieve market dominance.

title: The Startup Owner's Manual
author: Steve Blank and Bob Dorf
description: A comprehensive guide detailing the customer development process essential for building a scalable and successful startup.

title: The $100 Startup
author: Chris Guillebeau
description: Chronicles inspiring stories of individuals who started successful businesses on a minimal budget, emphasizing creativity and ingenuity.

title: Rework
author: Jason Fried and David Heinemeier Hansson
description: Challenges conventional business strategies, offering straightforward, counterintuitive advice to help anyone build a better business faster.

title: The Innovator's Dilemma
author: Clayton M. Christensen
description: Discusses how successful companies can do everything right and still lose their market leadership due to disruptive technologies.

title: Zero to One
author: Peter Thiel with Blake Masters
description: Encourages entrepreneurs to create new products that bring society from zero to one rather than iterating on existing products.
